search.original_name: ドラゴンクエスト～勇者アベル伝説～
search.overview: In the Ariahan village, on her 15th birthday, Tiala receives a red jewel from the elder Yogi. The jewel is the key to awaken the Great Dragon, whose blood grants eternal life. Due to this, the demon Baramos kidnaps Tiala. His childhood friend, Abel tries unsuccessfully to save her. He is given a blue jewel, the counterpart of the jewel that Tiala received, that can seal the Great Dragon and embarks on a mission to rescue Tiala.
search.name: 勇者斗恶龙 勇者阿贝尔传说

title: 超獣機神ダンクーガ 白熱の終章

search.name: 超獣機神ダンクーガ 白熱の終章
search.original_name: 超獣機神ダンクーガ 白熱の終章

title: アッセンブル・インサート

search.name: 怪力少女
search.original_name: アッセンブル・インサート
search.overview: 近未来的东京，谜之组织Demon Seed利用强化服来犯罪。警察对Demon Seed特殊工作课（简称：特工课）屡次出击失利后，现在正面临着存亡的危机。课长服部为了让特工课起死回生而举办了对Demon Seed作战的英雄偶像甄选会，最终由14岁的怪力少女南风麻伦胜出。此后，麻伦开始一面对抗Demon Seed，一面为成为超级偶像而奔走。

Kazuya is a 16-year-old, popular idol singer who has loads of female fans. Other than rehearse or sign autographs, he plays video games with his friend Akihiko. Akihiko is more violent than sweet toward Kazuya, but he is protective of him despite the many arguments they may get into. Akihiko later on confesses his love to Kazuya.
search.title: Be-Boy Kidnapp'n Idol

title: 敵は海賊〜猫たちの饗宴〜

search.name: 敌人是海盗- 猫们的飨宴
search.original_name: 敵は海賊 ～猫たちの饗宴～
search.overview: 拉蒂魯和阿普洛是海賊課的一對問題搭檔，在抓捕海盜的過程的破壞的公共設施比任何一名海盜都多所需賠付的賬單就算是抵押他們的宇宙船和所有的工資和退休金都無法還完
